import React, { useState } from 'react' import {FiChevronLeft, FiChevronRight} from "react-icons/fi" import {FaQuoteRight} from 'react-icons/fa' import data from "./data" function App() { const [people, setPeople] = useState(data) const [index, setIndex] = useState(0) return (

/Reviews

{people.map((person, personIndex) => { const { id, image, name, title, quote } = person return (

{pername}

{title}

{quote}

) })}
) } export default App
